eduversum.name: KolourPaint
eduversum.description: KolourPaint is an Open-Source and easy to use drawing and sketch program for KDE. It is well suited for everyday tasks like:[ul] [li]Drawing of diagrams and "freehand drawing"[/li] [li]Editing of wallpapers and photos with the use of effects[/li] [li]Editing of symbols - drawing cliparts and logos with transparency[/li] [/ul]
